arts.ttl: Luke Robinson on being Wigan Athletic's unlikely goal hero against Cambridge United
arts.sum: Luke Robinson admitted being Wigan Athletic's unlikely goal hero against Cambridge United will take more than a little getting used to.

arts.ttl: Paul Kendrick's player ratings - Wigan Athletic v Cambridge United - ‘...leaves literally everything out there...’
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic side that beat Cambridge United 1-0 at the Brick Community Stadium and delivers his report card.

arts.ttl: Glenn Whelan: Wigan Athletic's win over Cambridge United was 'all about the result, not the performance'
arts.sum: Glenn Whelan admitted Wigan Athletic's 1-0 victory over Cambridge United had been 'all about the result, not the performance'.

arts.ttl: Search planned for missing Wigan Athletic fan Darren Orme
arts.sum: Plans are being made for an organised search for a well-known Wigan Athletic fan who has been missing since Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Luke Robinson is Wigan Athletic hero against Cambridge United
arts.sum: Substitute Luke Robinson’s first senior goal was enough to give managerless Wigan Athletic a much-needed three points against struggling Cambridge United.

arts.ttl: Luke Robinson gives managerless Wigan victory over Cambridge
On-loan Liverpool defender Luke Chambers returns for Wigan Athletic v Cambridge United
arts.sum: Luke Chambers was a surprise inclusion on the Wigan Athletic team sheet for Saturday’s home game against Cambridge United.

arts.ttl: Shaun Maloney pens open letter to Wigan Athletic supporters
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has penned an open letter to the supporters of Wigan Athletic following his departure as manager last weekend.

arts.ttl: Former Premier League boss shoots to top of Wigan Athletic manager race
arts.sum: Former Wolverhampton Wanderers boss Gary O’Neil has shot from nowhere to become the new even-money favourite to replace Shaun Maloney as Wigan Athletic manager.

arts.ttl: PART 3: Wigan Athletic: The 12th Man - ‘Thank you for laying the foundations...you can hold your head up high’
arts.sum: In the third of a three-part special, our panel of Latics experts run the run over another eventful week at the club...a loss and a draw on the pitch, and the sacking of manager Shaun Maloney – which has divided the fanbase...
